description: Mail from the Isle of Man to Europe, Turkey and Canada is suspended due to disruption at UK ports.
title: Isle of Man international mail halted amid Covid-19 crisis
title_page: Isle of Man international mail halted amid Covid-19 crisis - BBC News
maintext: General manager of mail Geoff Rickard said post for those destinations already in the system would be transported to the UK and "securely held" until it could be delivered.
